issue.title: spring_stiffness and spring_reference are killed by model editor

content.raw:
True... I don't know enough to say how that would be done. My gut reaction is to say "just pick one".
Either only define these things in the SDF spec and generate message from that, or only define them in the msgs and generate the SDF spec from that. Not sure which of those is easier or more useful, but that's just my initial reaction.
